input.sentences: finding a parking place so we could watch the parade was not an easy task .
this guy did all sorts of tricks on his bicycle .
true good luck coming our way ... loved the dragon .
fun time watching the dancers and listening to the music .
my friends are having a wonderful time interacting with the parade participants .
output.sentences: I felt like a spectacle in my little yellow european car.
The colors on the street amazed me.
the crowd was immense but I pressed through to the stage.
The assortment of cultural art was a site to be seen.
There was everything from Latin dancers to Asian dancers there.
